022package org.parboiled.examples.sparql;
023
024import org.parboiled.Rule;
025import org.parboiled.parser.BaseParser;
026
027/**
028 * SPARQL Parser
029 *
030 * @author Ken Wenzel, adapted by Mathias Doenitz
031 */
032@SuppressWarnings({"InfiniteRecursion"})
033public class SparqlParser extends BaseParser<Object> {
034    // <Parser>
035    public Rule Query() {
036        return Sequence(WS(), Prologue(), FirstOf(SelectQuery(),
037                ConstructQuery(), DescribeQuery(), AskQuery()), EOI);
038    }
039
040    public Rule Prologue() {
041        return Sequence(Optional(BaseDecl()), ZeroOrMore(PrefixDecl()));
042    }
043
044    public Rule BaseDecl() {
045        return Sequence(BASE(), IRI_REF());
046    }
047
048    public Rule PrefixDecl() {
049        return Sequence(PREFIX(), PNAME_NS(), IRI_REF());
050    }
051
052    public Rule SelectQuery() {
053        return Sequence(SELECT(), Optional(FirstOf(DISTINCT(),
054                REDUCED())), FirstOf(OneOrMore(Var()), ASTERISK()),
055                ZeroOrMore(DatasetClause()), WhereClause(), SolutionModifier());
056    }
057
058    public Rule ConstructQuery() {
059        return Sequence(CONSTRUCT(), ConstructTemplate(),
060                ZeroOrMore(DatasetClause()), WhereClause(), SolutionModifier());
061    }
062
063    public Rule DescribeQuery() {
064        return Sequence(DESCRIBE(), FirstOf(OneOrMore(VarOrIRIref()),
065                ASTERISK()), ZeroOrMore(DatasetClause()),
066                Optional(WhereClause()), SolutionModifier());
067    }
068
069    public Rule AskQuery() {
070        return Sequence(ASK(), ZeroOrMore(DatasetClause()), WhereClause());
071    }
072
073    public Rule DatasetClause() {
074        return Sequence(FROM(), FirstOf(DefaultGraphClause(),
075                NamedGraphClause()));
076    }
077
078    public Rule DefaultGraphClause() {
079        return SourceSelector();
080    }
081
082    public Rule NamedGraphClause() {
083        return Sequence(NAMED(), SourceSelector());
084    }
085
086    public Rule SourceSelector() {
087        return IriRef();
088    }
089
090    public Rule WhereClause() {
091        return Sequence(Optional(WHERE()), GroupGraphPattern());
092    }
093
094    public Rule SolutionModifier() {
095        return Sequence(Optional(OrderClause()), Optional(LimitOffsetClauses()));
096    }
097
098    public Rule LimitOffsetClauses() {
099        return FirstOf(Sequence(LimitClause(), Optional(OffsetClause())),
100                Sequence(OffsetClause(), Optional(LimitClause())));
101    }
102
103    public Rule OrderClause() {
104        return Sequence(ORDER(), BY(), OneOrMore(OrderCondition()));
105    }
106
107    public Rule OrderCondition() {
108        return FirstOf(
109                Sequence(FirstOf(ASC(), DESC()), BrackettedExpression()),
110                FirstOf(Constraint(), Var()));
111    }
112
113    public Rule LimitClause() {
114        return Sequence(LIMIT(), INTEGER());
115    }
116
117    public Rule OffsetClause() {
118        return Sequence(OFFSET(), INTEGER());
119    }
120
121    public Rule GroupGraphPattern() {
122        return Sequence(OPEN_CURLY_BRACE(), Optional(TriplesBlock()),
123                ZeroOrMore(Sequence(
124                        FirstOf(GraphPatternNotTriples(), Filter()),
125                        Optional(DOT()), Optional(TriplesBlock()))),
126                CLOSE_CURLY_BRACE());
127    }
128
129    public Rule TriplesBlock() {
130        return Sequence(TriplesSameSubject(), Optional(Sequence(DOT(),
131                Optional(TriplesBlock()))));
132    }
133
134    public Rule GraphPatternNotTriples() {
135        return FirstOf(OptionalGraphPattern(), GroupOrUnionGraphPattern(),
136                GraphGraphPattern());
137    }
138
139    public Rule OptionalGraphPattern() {
140        return Sequence(OPTIONAL(), GroupGraphPattern());
141    }
142
143    public Rule GraphGraphPattern() {
144        return Sequence(GRAPH(), VarOrIRIref(), GroupGraphPattern());
145    }
146
147    public Rule GroupOrUnionGraphPattern() {
148        return Sequence(GroupGraphPattern(), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(UNION(),
149                GroupGraphPattern())));
150    }
151
152    public Rule Filter() {
153        return Sequence(FILTER(), Constraint());
154    }
155
156    public Rule Constraint() {
157        return FirstOf(BrackettedExpression(), BuiltInCall(), FunctionCall());
158    }
159
160    public Rule FunctionCall() {
161        return Sequence(IriRef(), ArgList());
162    }
163
164    public Rule ArgList() {
165        return FirstOf(Sequence(OPEN_BRACE(), CLOSE_BRACE()), Sequence(
166                OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(COMMA(),
167                        Expression())), CLOSE_BRACE()));
168    }
169
170    public Rule ConstructTemplate() {
171        return Sequence(OPEN_CURLY_BRACE(), Optional(ConstructTriples()),
172                CLOSE_CURLY_BRACE());
173    }
174
175    public Rule ConstructTriples() {
176        return Sequence(TriplesSameSubject(), Optional(Sequence(DOT(),
177                Optional(ConstructTriples()))));
178    }
179
180    public Rule TriplesSameSubject() {
181        return FirstOf(Sequence(VarOrTerm(), PropertyListNotEmpty()), Sequence(
182                TriplesNode(), PropertyList()));
183    }
184
185    public Rule PropertyListNotEmpty() {
186        return Sequence(Verb(), ObjectList(), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(SEMICOLON(),
187                Optional(Sequence(Verb(), ObjectList())))));
188    }
189
190    public Rule PropertyList() {
191        return Optional(PropertyListNotEmpty());
192    }
193
194    public Rule ObjectList() {
195        return Sequence(Object_(), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(COMMA(), Object_())));
196    }
197
198    public Rule Object_() {
199        return GraphNode();
200    }
201
202    public Rule Verb() {
203        return FirstOf(VarOrIRIref(), A());
204    }
205
206    public Rule TriplesNode() {
207        return FirstOf(Collection(), BlankNodePropertyList());
208    }
209
210    public Rule BlankNodePropertyList() {
211        return Sequence(OPEN_SQUARE_BRACE(), PropertyListNotEmpty(),
212                CLOSE_SQUARE_BRACE());
213    }
214
215    public Rule Collection() {
216        return Sequence(OPEN_BRACE(), OneOrMore(GraphNode()), CLOSE_BRACE());
217    }
218
219    public Rule GraphNode() {
220        return FirstOf(VarOrTerm(), TriplesNode());
221    }
222
223    public Rule VarOrTerm() {
224        return FirstOf(Var(), GraphTerm());
225    }
226
227    public Rule VarOrIRIref() {
228        return FirstOf(Var(), IriRef());
229    }
230
231    public Rule Var() {
232        return FirstOf(VAR1(), VAR2());
233    }
234
235    public Rule GraphTerm() {
236        return FirstOf(IriRef(), RdfLiteral(), NumericLiteral(),
237                BooleanLiteral(), BlankNode(), Sequence(OPEN_BRACE(),
238                        CLOSE_BRACE()));
239    }
240
241    public Rule Expression() {
242        return ConditionalOrExpression();
243    }
244
245    public Rule ConditionalOrExpression() {
246        return Sequence(ConditionalAndExpression(), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(OR(),
247                ConditionalAndExpression())));
248    }
249
250    public Rule ConditionalAndExpression() {
251        return Sequence(ValueLogical(), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(AND(),
252                ValueLogical())));
253    }
254
255    public Rule ValueLogical() {
256        return RelationalExpression();
257    }
258
259    public Rule RelationalExpression() {
260        return Sequence(NumericExpression(), Optional(FirstOf(//
261                Sequence(EQUAL(), NumericExpression()), //
262                Sequence(NOT_EQUAL(), NumericExpression()), //
263                Sequence(LESS(), NumericExpression()), //
264                Sequence(GREATER(), NumericExpression()), //
265                Sequence(LESS_EQUAL(), NumericExpression()), //
266                Sequence(GREATER_EQUAL(), NumericExpression()) //
267        ) //
268        ));
269    }
270
271    public Rule NumericExpression() {
272        return AdditiveExpression();
273    }
274
275    public Rule AdditiveExpression() {
276        return Sequence(MultiplicativeExpression(), //
277                ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(
278                        Sequence(PLUS(), MultiplicativeExpression()), //
279                        Sequence(MINUS(), MultiplicativeExpression()), //
280                        NumericLiteralPositive(), NumericLiteralNegative()) //
281                ));
282    }
283
284    public Rule MultiplicativeExpression() {
285        return Sequence(UnaryExpression(), ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(Sequence(
286                ASTERISK(), UnaryExpression()), Sequence(DIVIDE(),
287                UnaryExpression()))));
288    }
289
290    public Rule UnaryExpression() {
291        return FirstOf(Sequence(NOT(), PrimaryExpression()), Sequence(PLUS(),
292                PrimaryExpression()), Sequence(MINUS(), PrimaryExpression()),
293                PrimaryExpression());
294    }
295
296    public Rule PrimaryExpression() {
297        return FirstOf(BrackettedExpression(), BuiltInCall(),
298                IriRefOrFunction(), RdfLiteral(), NumericLiteral(),
299                BooleanLiteral(), Var());
300    }
301
302    public Rule BrackettedExpression() {
303        return Sequence(OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE());
304    }
305
306    public Rule BuiltInCall() {
307        return FirstOf(
308                Sequence(STR(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
309                Sequence(LANG(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
310                Sequence(LANGMATCHES(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), COMMA(),
311                        Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
312                Sequence(DATATYPE(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
313                Sequence(BOUND(), OPEN_BRACE(), Var(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
314                Sequence(SAMETERM(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), COMMA(),
315                        Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
316                Sequence(ISIRI(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
317                Sequence(ISURI(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
318                Sequence(ISBLANK(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
319                Sequence(ISLITERAL(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), CLOSE_BRACE()),
320                RegexExpression());
321    }
322
323    public Rule RegexExpression() {
324        return Sequence(REGEX(), OPEN_BRACE(), Expression(), COMMA(),
325                Expression(), Optional(Sequence(COMMA(), Expression())),
326                CLOSE_BRACE());
327    }
328
329    public Rule IriRefOrFunction() {
330        return Sequence(IriRef(), Optional(ArgList()));
331    }
332
333    public Rule RdfLiteral() {
334        return Sequence(String(), Optional(FirstOf(LANGTAG(), Sequence(
335                REFERENCE(), IriRef()))));
336    }
337
338    public Rule NumericLiteral() {
339        return FirstOf(NumericLiteralUnsigned(), NumericLiteralPositive(),
340                NumericLiteralNegative());
341    }
342
343    public Rule NumericLiteralUnsigned() {
344        return FirstOf(DOUBLE(), DECIMAL(), INTEGER());
345    }
346
347    public Rule NumericLiteralPositive() {
348        return FirstOf(DOUBLE_POSITIVE(), DECIMAL_POSITIVE(),
349                INTEGER_POSITIVE());
350    }
351
352    public Rule NumericLiteralNegative() {
353        return FirstOf(DOUBLE_NEGATIVE(), DECIMAL_NEGATIVE(),
354                INTEGER_NEGATIVE());
355    }
356
357    public Rule BooleanLiteral() {
358        return FirstOf(TRUE(), FALSE());
359    }
360
361    public Rule String() {
362        return FirstOf(STRING_LITERAL_LONG1(), STRING_LITERAL1(),
363                STRING_LITERAL_LONG2(), STRING_LITERAL2());
364    }
365
366    public Rule IriRef() {
367        return FirstOf(IRI_REF(), PrefixedName());
368    }
369
370    public Rule PrefixedName() {
371        return FirstOf(PNAME_LN(), PNAME_NS());
372    }
373
374    public Rule BlankNode() {
375        return FirstOf(BLANK_NODE_LABEL(), Sequence(OPEN_SQUARE_BRACE(),
376                CLOSE_SQUARE_BRACE()));
377    }
378    // </Parser>
379
380    // <Lexer>
381
382    public Rule WS() {
383        return ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(COMMENT(), WS_NO_COMMENT()));
384    }
385
386    public Rule WS_NO_COMMENT() {
387        return FirstOf(Ch(' '), Ch('\t'), Ch('\f'), EOL());
388    }
389
390    public Rule PNAME_NS() {
391        return Sequence(Optional(PN_PREFIX()), ChWS(':'));
392    }
393
394    public Rule PNAME_LN() {
395        return Sequence(PNAME_NS(), PN_LOCAL());
396    }
397
398    public Rule BASE() {
399        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("BASE");
400    }
401
402    public Rule PREFIX() {
403        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("PREFIX");
404    }
405
406    public Rule SELECT() {
407        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("SELECT");
408    }
409
410    public Rule DISTINCT() {
411        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("DISTINCT");
412    }
413
414    public Rule REDUCED() {
415        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("REDUCED");
416    }
417
418    public Rule CONSTRUCT() {
419        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("CONSTRUCT");
420    }
421
422    public Rule DESCRIBE() {
423        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("DESCRIBE");
424    }
425
426    public Rule ASK() {
427        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ASK");
428    }
429
430    public Rule FROM() {
431        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("FROM");
432    }
433
434    public Rule NAMED() {
435        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("NAMED");
436    }
437
438    public Rule WHERE() {
439        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("WHERE");
440    }
441
442    public Rule ORDER() {
443        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ORDER");
444    }
445
446    public Rule BY() {
447        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("BY");
448    }
449
450    public Rule ASC() {
451        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ASC");
452    }
453
454    public Rule DESC() {
455        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("DESC");
456    }
457
458    public Rule LIMIT() {
459        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("LIMIT");
460    }
461
462    public Rule OFFSET() {
463        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("OFFSET");
464    }
465
466    public Rule OPTIONAL() {
467        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("OPTIONAL");
468    }
469
470    public Rule GRAPH() {
471        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("GRAPH");
472    }
473
474    public Rule UNION() {
475        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("UNION");
476    }
477
478    public Rule FILTER() {
479        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("FILTER");
480    }
481
482    public Rule A() {
483        return ChWS('a');
484    }
485
486    public Rule STR() {
487        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("STR");
488    }
489
490    public Rule LANG() {
491        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("LANG");
492    }
493
494    public Rule LANGMATCHES() {
495        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("LANGMATCHES");
496    }
497
498    public Rule DATATYPE() {
499        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("DATATYPE");
500    }
501
502    public Rule BOUND() {
503        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("BOUND");
504    }
505
506    public Rule SAMETERM() {
507        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("SAMETERM");
508    }
509
510    public Rule ISIRI() {
511        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ISIRI");
512    }
513
514    public Rule ISURI() {
515        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ISURI");
516    }
517
518    public Rule ISBLANK() {
519        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ISBLANK");
520    }
521
522    public Rule ISLITERAL() {
523        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("ISLITERAL");
524    }
525
526    public Rule REGEX() {
527        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("REGEX");
528    }
529
530    public Rule TRUE() {
531        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("TRUE");
532    }
533
534    public Rule FALSE() {
535        return StringIgnoreCaseWS("FALSE");
536    }
537
538    public Rule IRI_REF() {
539        return Sequence(LESS_NO_COMMENT(), //
540                ZeroOrMore(Sequence(TestNot(FirstOf(LESS_NO_COMMENT(), GREATER(), '"', OPEN_CURLY_BRACE(),
541                        CLOSE_CURLY_BRACE(), '|', '^', '\\', '`', CharRange('\u0000', '\u0020'))), ANY)), //
542                GREATER());
543    }
544
545    public Rule BLANK_NODE_LABEL() {
546        return Sequence("_:", PN_LOCAL(), WS());
547    }
548
549    public Rule VAR1() {
550        return Sequence('?', VARNAME(), WS());
551    }
552
553    public Rule VAR2() {
554        return Sequence('$', VARNAME(), WS());
555    }
556
557    public Rule LANGTAG() {
558        return Sequence('@', OneOrMore(PN_CHARS_BASE()), ZeroOrMore(Sequence(
559                MINUS(), OneOrMore(Sequence(PN_CHARS_BASE(), DIGIT())))), WS());
560    }
561
562    public Rule INTEGER() {
563        return Sequence(OneOrMore(DIGIT()), WS());
564    }
565
566    public Rule DECIMAL() {
567        return Sequence(FirstOf( //
568                Sequence(OneOrMore(DIGIT()), DOT(), ZeroOrMore(DIGIT())), //
569                Sequence(DOT(), OneOrMore(DIGIT())) //
570        ), WS());
571    }
572
573    public Rule DOUBLE() {
574        return Sequence(FirstOf(//
575                Sequence(OneOrMore(DIGIT()), DOT(), ZeroOrMore(DIGIT()),
576                        EXPONENT()), //
577                Sequence(DOT(), OneOrMore(DIGIT()), EXPONENT()), //
578                Sequence(OneOrMore(DIGIT()), EXPONENT())), WS());
579    }
580
581    public Rule INTEGER_POSITIVE() {
582        return Sequence(PLUS(), INTEGER());
583    }
584
585    public Rule DECIMAL_POSITIVE() {
586        return Sequence(PLUS(), DECIMAL());
587    }
588
589    public Rule DOUBLE_POSITIVE() {
590        return Sequence(PLUS(), DOUBLE());
591    }
592
593    public Rule INTEGER_NEGATIVE() {
594        return Sequence(MINUS(), INTEGER());
595    }
596
597    public Rule DECIMAL_NEGATIVE() {
598        return Sequence(MINUS(), DECIMAL());
599    }
600
601    public Rule DOUBLE_NEGATIVE() {
602        return Sequence(MINUS(), DOUBLE());
603    }
604
605    public Rule EXPONENT() {
606        return Sequence(IgnoreCase('e'), Optional(FirstOf(PLUS(), MINUS())),
607                OneOrMore(DIGIT()));
608    }
609
610    public Rule STRING_LITERAL1() {
611        return Sequence("'", ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(Sequence(TestNot(FirstOf("'",
612                '\\', '\n', '\r')), ANY), ECHAR())), "'", WS());
613    }
614
615    public Rule STRING_LITERAL2() {
616        return Sequence('"', ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(Sequence(TestNot(AnyOf("\"\\\n\r")), ANY), ECHAR())), '"', WS());
617    }
618
619    public Rule STRING_LITERAL_LONG1() {
620        return Sequence("'''", ZeroOrMore(Sequence(
621                Optional(FirstOf("''", "'")), FirstOf(Sequence(TestNot(FirstOf(
622                        "'", "\\")), ANY), ECHAR()))), "'''", WS());
623    }
624
625    public Rule STRING_LITERAL_LONG2() {
626        return Sequence("\"\"\"", ZeroOrMore(Sequence(Optional(FirstOf("\"\"", "\"")),
627                FirstOf(Sequence(TestNot(FirstOf("\"", "\\")), ANY), ECHAR()))), "\"\"\"", WS());
628    }
629
630    public Rule ECHAR() {
631        return Sequence('\\', AnyOf("tbnrf\\\"\'"));
632    }
633
634    public Rule PN_CHARS_U() {
635        return FirstOf(PN_CHARS_BASE(), '_');
636    }
637
638    public Rule VARNAME() {
639        return Sequence(FirstOf(PN_CHARS_U(), DIGIT()), ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(
640                PN_CHARS_U(), DIGIT(), '\u00B7', CharRange('\u0300', '\u036F'), CharRange('\u203F', '\u2040'))), WS());
641    }
642
643    public Rule PN_CHARS() {
644        return FirstOf(MINUS(), DIGIT(), PN_CHARS_U(), '\u00B7',
645                CharRange('\u0300', '\u036F'), CharRange('\u203F', '\u2040'));
646    }
647
648    public Rule PN_PREFIX() {
649        return Sequence(PN_CHARS_BASE(), Optional(ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(PN_CHARS(), Sequence(DOT(), PN_CHARS())))));
650    }
651
652    public Rule PN_LOCAL() {
653        return Sequence(FirstOf(PN_CHARS_U(), DIGIT()),
654                Optional(ZeroOrMore(FirstOf(PN_CHARS(), Sequence(DOT(), PN_CHARS())))), WS());
655    }
656
657    public Rule PN_CHARS_BASE() {
658        return FirstOf( //
659                CharRange('A', 'Z'),//
660                CharRange('a', 'z'), //
661                CharRange('\u00C0', '\u00D6'), //
662                CharRange('\u00D8', '\u00F6'), //
663                CharRange('\u00F8', '\u02FF'), //
664                CharRange('\u0370', '\u037D'), //
665                CharRange('\u037F', '\u1FFF'), //
666                CharRange('\u200C', '\u200D'), //
667                CharRange('\u2070', '\u218F'), //
668                CharRange('\u2C00', '\u2FEF'), //
669                CharRange('\u3001', '\uD7FF'), //
670                CharRange('\uF900', '\uFDCF'), //
671                CharRange('\uFDF0', '\uFFFD') //
672        );
673    }
674
675    public Rule DIGIT() {
676        return CharRange('0', '9');
677    }
678
679    public Rule COMMENT() {
680        return Sequence('#', ZeroOrMore(Sequence(TestNot(EOL()), ANY)), EOL());
681    }
682
683    public Rule EOL() {
684        return AnyOf("\n\r");
685    }
686
687    public Rule REFERENCE() {
688        return StringWS("^^");
689    }
690
691    public Rule LESS_EQUAL() {
692        return StringWS("<=");
693    }
694
695    public Rule GREATER_EQUAL() {
696        return StringWS(">=");
697    }
698
699    public Rule NOT_EQUAL() {
700        return StringWS("!=");
701    }
702
703    public Rule AND() {
704        return StringWS("&&");
705    }
706
707    public Rule OR() {
708        return StringWS("||");
709    }
710
711    public Rule OPEN_BRACE() {
712        return ChWS('(');
713    }
714
715    public Rule CLOSE_BRACE() {
716        return ChWS(')');
717    }
718
719    public Rule OPEN_CURLY_BRACE() {
720        return ChWS('{');
721    }
722
723    public Rule CLOSE_CURLY_BRACE() {
724        return ChWS('}');
725    }
726
727    public Rule OPEN_SQUARE_BRACE() {
728        return ChWS('[');
729    }
730
731    public Rule CLOSE_SQUARE_BRACE() {
732        return ChWS(']');
733    }
734
735    public Rule SEMICOLON() {
736        return ChWS(';');
737    }
738
739    public Rule DOT() {
740        return ChWS('.');
741    }
742
743    public Rule PLUS() {
744        return ChWS('+');
745    }
746
747    public Rule MINUS() {
748        return ChWS('-');
749    }
750
751    public Rule ASTERISK() {
752        return ChWS('*');
753    }
754
755    public Rule COMMA() {
756        return ChWS(',');
757    }
758
759    public Rule NOT() {
760        return ChWS('!');
761    }
762
763    public Rule DIVIDE() {
764        return ChWS('/');
765    }
766
767    public Rule EQUAL() {
768        return ChWS('=');
769    }
770
771    public Rule LESS_NO_COMMENT() {
772        return Sequence(Ch('<'), ZeroOrMore(WS_NO_COMMENT()));
773    }
774
775    public Rule LESS() {
776        return ChWS('<');
777    }
778
779    public Rule GREATER() {
780        return ChWS('>');
781    }
782    // </Lexer>
783
784    public Rule ChWS(char c) {
785        return Sequence(Ch(c), WS());
786    }
787
788    public Rule StringWS(String s) {
789        return Sequence(String(s), WS());
790    }
791
792    public Rule StringIgnoreCaseWS(String string) {
793        return Sequence(IgnoreCase(string), WS());
794    }
795
796}
